entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 14. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries this morning and early this afternoon then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 14. Wind chill minus 33 this morning and minus 18 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 07:45 AM CDT Monday 20 March 2023
